data.actual_result: Always "Your" is used although it is not your nickname.
data.expected_result: The error message for not possible nickname change should be more general. Solution would be to remove "Your".
data.short_description: Error message for nickname change via server settings not possible: Always "Your" used
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings - Open `Members` - Open any member (not yourself) - Try to change the nickname to a too long name (more than 32 chars) - Observe the error message
